--Description des views Button that plays or pauses the music
-- Description des articles Sweet yellow bananas, rich in potassium and perfect as a healthy snack (Location: Ecuador, Farm: Tropicale Delicioso) Juicy red cherries, ideal for desserts or simply to enjoy as they are (Location: France, Farm: Rouge Sucré) A crisp green cabbage, perfect for salads or stir-fry dishes" (Location: Canada, Farm: Croquante Canadienne) Fresh, flavorful mushrooms, perfect for adding flavor to many dishes (Location: USA, Farm: ChampiFrais) Crisp, green zucchini, perfect for grilled or stir-fried dishes (Location: Spain, Farm: Verte Espagnole) Iron-rich green spinach, perfect for smoothies or as a side dish (Location: France, Farm: Feuille Verte Française) Sweet, yellow corn on the cob, perfect for summer grilling or as a side dish (Location: USA, Farm: American Golden) Juicy oranges full of vitamin C, perfect for juicing or eating as fruit (Location: Spain, Farm: Spanish Orange Juice) Green, sweet peas, perfect with many dishes or in salads (Location: France, Farm: Petit Pois Français) Juicy grapes, perfect for snacks or to add to fruit salads (Location: Italy, Farm: Italian Sweet Grapes) Cart
